explanation: The sentiment in the chat is mixed but leans slightly bearish for BTC in the short term. Several users mention failed supports, trendline rejection, and a possible bear fractal or head and shoulders pattern forming on higher timeframes. Price targets mentioned (105200-105350 to the downside, 108750-109675 to the upside) reflect indecision, but the inability to hold the daily open and the presence of bearish chart patterns suggest a mild short-term downside bias. There is no strong consensus for an aggressive move in either direction, and some traders are hesitant or hedging, which reduces confidence.
representative_opinions: Tjeerd Phaff: we rejected trendline, daily open could not hold
mpepin1905: bear fractal lookin on the 4h or even head and shoulder lookin
oscartg638: the breakout target to the downside is 105200 and to the upside is 108750 approximately.
Tjeerd Phaff: not saying we can't go up but i would be surprised
Hoover: Drop it to 105,350 then launch up!
Dude Talk: lots of food at bottom but no one selling thier btc
